# Haxe Roundup № 10

If you have not already heard (if you� haven't,� whats wrong with you…), Apple has [lifted their ban] on third party framework compiled apps and Adobe have [restarted developing] the [iPhone packager].

Via twitter

Franco Ponticelli, the haXe / php creator, is looking to do an [introduction to haXe] at Codebits 2010, go and show your support by thumbing up the talk

    • disktree has just released [HXMPP version 0.4.3]. Includes websocket support for flash and javascript. The only XMPP server to support websocket
